name: Penguin Dash
description:
A quick penguin-runner game that tests hand-eye coordination. Developed over the Fall 2014 semester at UCF for Casual Game Production.

Bet you can't reach 100 score!

            Controls  

[ A ]   ,  [ D ]   to move left and right

[ Spacebar ]   to Jump

Developed by:  Josh Lamb, George Crudo, John Tyson, Ben Koehn, Nicholas Williams

Thank you for playing!
